dialog.default: The ruins speak to those who listen. Darkness stirs once more.
dialog.high_charisma: Your presence is calming. The ruins need heroes like you.

dialog.default: Bah, adventurers. Always causing more trouble than they fix.
dialog.low_charisma: Get lost, you look like trouble!
dialog.high_charisma: Hmph, you seem alright for an adventurer.

dialog.default: We've seen increased movement near the undercity. Something's coming.
dialog.low_charisma: I don’t trust you. State your business.
dialog.high_charisma: You look capable. We need help in the undercity.

dialog.default: Faith alone cannot turn back the tide. We must act swiftly.
dialog.low_charisma: Your aura is troubling. Why are you here?
dialog.high_charisma: The gods favor you. Will you aid us?

dialog.default: The right coin can make anyone... cooperative.
dialog.low_charisma: You’re not worth my time. Scram.
dialog.high_charisma: You’ve got charm. Let’s talk business.

dialog.default: The cards show many paths... but all lead to blood.
dialog.low_charisma: The cards scorn you. Leave me be.
dialog.high_charisma: The cards favor you. Seek the truth.

dialog.default: Every service has its price. What's your offer worth?
dialog.low_charisma: I don’t deal with riffraff. Beat it.
dialog.high_charisma: A pleasure to meet you. Let’s make a deal.

dialog.default: The moon's song tonight tells of doors best left unopened...
dialog.low_charisma: Your soul is dim. Stay away from the Feywild.
dialog.high_charisma: The moon sings for you. Will you heed its call?
